ctx: intros m z i Hmap Hexd.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "degree m (Iter (f m) i z)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros m z i Hmap Hexd.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart i : nat Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z IHi : degree m z = degree m (Iter (f m) i z) Unable to unify "exd m z" with "expo m (f m (Iter (f m) i z)) z".

ctx: intros m z i Hmap Hexd.

original: intros m z i Hmap Hexd. induction i. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHi. symmetry. apply expo_degree. + apply Hmap. + apply Hexd. + apply Iter_period. * apply Hmap. * apply Hexd.
